mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_name, admin_password, admin_level, admin_gmt_create, admin_gmt_modified from admin;

select admin_id as adminId, admin_name as adminName, admin_password as adminPassword, admin_level as adminLevel, admin_gmt_create as createTime, admin_gmt_modified as updateTime from admin where admin_name = #{adminName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin ( admin_name, admin_password, admin_level, admin_gmt_create, admin_gmt_modified) VALUES ( #{adminName}, #{adminPassword}, #{adminLevel}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update admin set admin_name = #{adminName}, admin_password = #{adminPassword}, admin_level = #{adminLevel}, admin_gmt_modified = #{updateTime} where admin_id = #{adminId}
